mapper.select: SELECT sold_id , book_sold.registerd_id , book_sold.buyer_id , book_selling.isbn , nick_name FROM book_sold, member, book_selling WHERE (book_sold.registerd_id = book_selling.registerd_id) AND (book_sold.buyer_id = member.account_id) AND (book_sold.buyer_id = #{account_id}) ORDER BY sold_id DESC
